channel.title: My Goals and Achievements
channel.description:
Hey guys, This is my achievement thread. I'll update this daily with what levels i get.
Here's My Adventurer's Log: ----
Note: I've changed my account from being a 10 hitpoint pure magic to a range tanker. Please check out my new achievements!
[b]Important: Spelojohan Bought me a Pin, thank-you very much mate.[/b]
[img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/4192/agilityicon.png[/img] Agility - 60 / 70 [img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/9797/attackicon.png[/img] Attack - 70 / 75 [img]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/1672/constitutionicon.png[/img] Hitpoints - 65 / 80 [img]http://img186.imageshack.us/img186/7877/cookingicon.png[/img] Cooking - 99 / 99 [img]http://img180.imageshack.us/img180/4341/craftingicon.png[/img] Crafting - 70 / 70 [img]http://img251.imageshack.us/img251/8973/defenceicon.png[/img] Defence - 45 / 45 [img]http://img188.imageshack.us/img188/5971/farmingicon.png[/img] Farming - 1 / 70 [img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/1150/firemakingicon.png[/img] Firemaking - 99 / 99 [img]http://img530.imageshack.us/img530/6497/fishingicon.png[/img] Fishing - 99 / 99 [img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/1755/fletchingicon.png[/img] Fletching - 70 / 70 [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/4394/herbloreicon.png[/img] Herblore - 60 / 70 [img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/9637/huntericono.png[/img] Hunter - 1 / 70 [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/77/magicicon.png[/img] Magic - 90 / 99 [img]http://img709.imageshack.us/img709/6718/miningicon.png[/img] Mining - 70 / 70 [img]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/6597/prayericonp.png[/img] Prayer - 60 / 70 [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/9620/rangediconm.png[/img] Ranged - 62 / 99 [img]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/2523/runecraftingicon.png[/img] Runecrafting - 1 / 70 [img]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/4863/slayericon.png[/img] Slayer - 1 / 70 [img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/2353/smithingiconlv.png[/img] Smithing - 70 / 70 [img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/5277/strengthiconw.png[/img] Strength - 70 / 99 [img]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/4906/summoningicon.png[/img] Summoning - 1 / 1 [img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/6988/thievingicon.png[/img] Thieving - 65 / 70 [img]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/7007/woodcuttingicon.png[/img] Woodcutting - 99 / 99 [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100412121205/runescape/images/3/3e/Dungeoneering-icon.png[/img] Dungeoneering - 1 / 70
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091206111359/runescape/images/d/db/Stats_Overall_icon_highscores.png[/img] Total Level - 1330 / 2000
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090708173152/runescape/images/e/ef/CombatSwords.PNG[/img] Combat Level - 80 / 104 [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100412090318/runescape/images/0/07/Music_icon.PNG[/img] Songs - 213 / 790 [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090322204214/runescape/images/5/56/Questicon.PNG[/img] Quests - 43 / 319 [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110202033350/runescape/images/3/30/Coins_10000.png[/img] Coins - 15,000,000 / 500,000,000

item.title: My Goals and Achievements
item.dc:creator: @nL1 nL
item.description:
@nL1 wrote:

I noticed you didnt know what combat level you’d be. So here are the tools to figure it out.
The first link will tell you your combat level, the second link will be used to determine your hp level by typing in all of your desired stats, use that hp level, and type it along with your stats in the first links calc and you get your combat.

Combat Calc:
http://www.tip.it/runescape/?page=combat_calc.htm

Hp Calc:
http://www.scape-xp.com/runescape-hitpoints-calculator.html

Read full topic

item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Nasz link=topic=500101.msg3665559#msg3665559 date=1310596924]
Gl on this, I can lend you 3m when I get unbanned in 19 days. (Maybe more if I get good drops at Bandos ;p). :rolleyes:
[/quote]

[quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=443834.msg3259032#msg3259032 date=1278358949]

[ol][li]No threads discussing loaning of money or items (exception is the built-in runescape lending system, since you can’t be scammed with it).[/li][/ol]

[/quote]No you can’t lend him 3M.[/quote]

It’s not a thread, he’s publicly displaying that he is willing to give money to him.

My bank is currently at 8M. So, unfortunately; I cannot loan at this time. However, I’m rushing Hunter / whenever people begin to pay back, I should be able to loan some.

item.title: My Goals and Achievements
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Not even close.

Level 1 - 95
(0XP - 8,771,558XP)

Only 13,924 frost dragon bones would be needed on a gilded altar.

This averages out at 14,100 GP per bone, and 196,328,400 GP. (196.3M)

Though, that would be the fast way. To save money, you could do: 167,078 Big bones on a gilded altar.

This averages to 323 GP per bone, and 53,966,194 GP (53.9M)[/quote]
Thanks for that detailed summary, also do you think you can loan me 10m?

Note: Edited my post.

I’ve updated the main post as on 11-July-2011 @ 7:36 AM (AEST).

Read full topic
